QuestData.Title: Cindermaul, the Portal Master
QuestData.Description: Twilight's Hammer is using these corridors, and others like them, to move supplies from the elemental planes up into Azeroth. In order to seal these passages off, we're going to need to know how they're constructed.$B$BFind for me the Tome of Openings, used by the elementals to open gates between the planes.$B$BCindermaul the Portal Master should have one. You'll have to kill him. Careful! He's probably got some tricks up his sleeve...
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Be careful: Cindermaul will almost certainly call forth reinforcements from the other elemental planes.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Cindermaul and locate the Tome of Openings.
QuestData.CompletionText: The tome! Have you found it?
QuestData.RewardText: This is the tome we've heard about?$B$B<Jordan hefts the stone slab into his arms and looks it over.>$B$BI see... I guess it's good that I can read some of the elemental script. I'll work on translating this. Meanwhile, there's one final problem to take care of.
